page.title: 12THE NEW FURNITURE STORE
page.content: {A large furniture shop}has just extended its premises in{Thurso to 16,000 sq.feet and also added storage space of 10,000 sq. feet so giving our part of the town of{Thurso a large, modern furniture store. There are twelve employees. They in- clude managers, sales assistants, carpet fitters and delivery men. Most of the furniture is British made and some is actually manufactured by the company. In the electrical department we found many items imported from Japan. The firm attracts customers from a wide area and has even delivered to Belgium. Prices are very competitive. Some of the prices noted were a leather suite reduced from Â£2500 to Â£1800 for the opening sale, a double bed at Â£169 and a micro wave oven at Â£223.
